e4d7ac934a5608807fe9130e93a22a50 (03:02): permissions?

b0a90be919a9f920bb8ad2caca4e91f0 (03:02): Files need to be readable by the Apache user (e.g. 644).  Directories and scripts need the X bit too (e.g. 755).  That includes *all* parent directories of a resource.  If you have a symlink, check both the source and target or If you have AllowOverride for an unreadable directory, the error
b0a90be919a9f920bb8ad2caca4e91f0 (03:02): ..message will refer to .htaccess.  See also selinux
